section.title: Collaborative Authorship
section.t: When multiple authors contribute to a single document, the Proof of Process framework MUST maintain distinct evidence chains for each contributor while enabling a unified verification of the composite work.

section.title: Multi-Author Evidence Model
section.t: Each author operates an independent Attester that produces evidence packets bound to their device identity. The collaborative evidence structure links these independent chains through:

list.t: A shared document identifier derived from the initial content hash.
Merge evidence packets that record when one author's changes are integrated into the shared document state.
Cross-attestation signatures where co-authors acknowledge each other's contributions.
